marklogic.body:
THIS OLD MAN FLIP FLOPS....I DISMISS HIM & I CHOOSE TO RANT INSTEAD ABOUT NEA.....
On C-SPAN, the Democrats, led by Congressman Jim Moran, 8th District of Virginia are fighting to block a $10,000,000.00 cut in funds from the NEA ($145,000,000.00 budget) who got a big boost in stimulus funds if you all recall, was granted $50,000,000. Â That is now being challenged by Republicans. Â Personally, I find the NEA subject to cuts like any other program that is not but could certainly be supported by philanthropy is it is so important. Â In the course of the last two years, we have learned of NEA (tax-payer funded remember) funds have been distributed to projects that produced artistic (Cough) Â ' p o r n ' , and art that attacked Christianity and the image of Christ. Â Furthermore, the most shocking transgression is/was, the NEA, (or members of) who were more than happy to take stimulus funds (buy 's, I prefer) also took a meeting/calls from the White House who basically made it clear to a group of arts and/or representatives of NEA that they would like their art to include 'work for the Obama' regime. Â I suppose in public art or generally in fine art endeavors. Â NEA touched the leper...Obama. Â Like NPR, I say why should any taxpayer dollars to directed to this organization which has chosen to behave like a street w h o r e Â for the loot?
One 'gentlewoman' (D) from California got up and began with "I'm the coolest grandmother in the world." Â Her point was that she lives n close proximity to a renowned, iconic arts organization. Â She continued to bleat about what a shame it would be if (the Smithsonian, Ca.) were forced to cut back services and programs that her grandchildren delight in. Â Well, dear, why don't you explain to your grandchildren that you chose a behemoth social program, ObamaCare. Â A crippling monstrosity. Â You also chose to fund studies such as just a small sampling from the '100' top, stupid waste projects funded by stimulus funds:
1.Â Monkeys Get High for Science (Winston-Salem, NC) - $144,541 2.Â Scientist Attempts to Create Joke Machine (Evanston, IL) - $712,883Â 3. Research: Marketing Video Games to the Elderly (Raleigh, NC and Atlanta, GA) - $1.2 million 4. The Wheels on the Stimulus Go Round and Round (Clearfield, PA) - $1.4 million 5. Money for Healthy Homes and Lead Hazard Control to Ineligible Recipients - $2.8 million 6.Â NIH Spends Stimulus Money to Promote the Impact of Its Stimulus Projects (Silver Spring, MD) - $363,760546 7.Â Whistle blower Alleges Fraud at Company Administering Child Care Funds (Kilgore, TX) - $215 million 8.Â Health Insurance Grants go Unused (Washington, DC) - $142 million 9. Â Army Corps of Engineers Cleaning Up Their Act in West Virginia (Burnsville, WV) -Â $650,00010. 10. Â Helping Drinkers Control Their Alcohol Consumption With Creative Labeling (San Diego,Â Ca.) $497,117
Explain to your grandchildren that you, a cool grandma, are also a big spending, big government creating far left progressive, liberal Democrat that has no idea how to budget for the country and YOUR priorities are now coming home to roost with the chickens. Â And obviously, the millions above far exceed the $10,000,000.00 dollars being requested by the mean, nasty Republicans.
